root.name: Ether Vapor Remaster
root.description: OverviewBe the unknown pilot in a prototype fighter that helps out the country of Lydia against Caldea. The latter is technology wise more advanced as Lydia and dominates the country for ages. But now you can help break that and liberate the people of Lydia. But for what purposes you are helping them remains unknown until the story unfolds by playing the game.The game is a overhaul of the free downloadable game Ether Vapor by the same company. The Remastered version contains a better game- and soundengine, higher resolutions, better models and better lightning.Note that Ether Vapor supports resolutions up to 1600x1200.System RequirementsMinimum:OS:Windows XP / Vista / 7Processor:Pentium4 3.0GHzMemory:512 MB RAMGraphics:VGA with DirectX9 or later 3D functionalityDirectX®:9.0Hard Drive:100 MB HD spaceSound:DirectSound compatibleRecommended:OS:Windows XP / Vista / 7Processor:Pentium4 3.0GHz or betterMemory:512 MB RAMGraphics:VGA with DirectX9 or later 3D functionalityDirectX®:9.0Hard Drive:100 MB HD spaceSound:DirectSound compatible
